Name: Purify
Effect: Single Target. Heal a Target's Status Ailment (Burns, Freeze, Paralysis, Poisons, Sleep). *If a Status Ailment was healed this way, the User may spend 1 Will point to restore 2 HP.
Description: The target is covered by a gelatinous goo to which every impurity sticks. The user then convinces the target eats this goo, and ends up pleasantly surprised by the sweet flavor.
